title: Virtue tax <> Hiver AI follow-up session & Renewal

signals.problem_statement: The sentiment analysis feature was not functioning as expected for the customer.
signals.customer_ask: Can you confirm if the sentiment analysis will work now?

signals.problem_statement: The thank you detector feature is perceived as time-consuming for the customer.
signals.customer_ask: Can this process be automated to save time?

signals.problem_statement: The AI tagging feature requires manual input of tags for initial learning, which is cumbersome.
signals.customer_ask: Is there a way to simplify the tagging process?

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unclear about how the ask AI feature operates and its benefits.
signals.customer_ask: Can you provide a clearer example of how ask AI works?

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the risk of signing a long-term contract without clear benefits.
signals.customer_ask: What advantages can you offer for a two or three-year contract?
